body.p:
Head-Quarters Department of the Ohio,
Cincinnati, Ohio, October 15th 1863,
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 397,

1 ,, ,, ,, Sergeant Charles Bradley, Co "E" 25th Regiment Michigan Volunteers, is discharged the service, to date from the tenth day of October 1863, to enable him to accept a Commission then tendered him by the Governor of Kentucky and since when he has been acting in the capacity of a Commissioned Officer.

By Order of Major General Burnside.
(Signed) W, P, Anderson.
Assistant Adjutant General.

Official
Ro. Morrow
Asst Adjt Genl.
